<script data-cfasync="false" type="text/javascript">
  var freestar = freestar || {};
  freestar.queue = freestar.queue || [];
  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};
  freestar.config.disabledProducts = {"sideWall":true};
  freestar.config.enabled_slots = [];
  freestar.initCallback = function () {
    (freestar.config.enabled_slots.length === 0) ? freestar.initCallbackCalled = false : freestar.newAdSlots(freestar.config.enabled_slots);
  };

    <!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_header -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __970x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_header" v-pre>
</div>
        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 itemprop="name" class="text-center medium-text-left">Bright, Hot Pleasing <small style='white-space: nowrap'>for women and men</small></h1></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x href="/goto.php?linktype=freestyle&amp;ref=p5z5q4o4x5z2243456s446s274i474m5i444f49464m4b4k4m2j5u5m434j4k5j5m464e40405t5i5a406o5k4f4h4e416f5y584i4c4j414d4x514h4l4f44494544454z5t3u406d4e516j4o4o4g5l5i4j5r4i5m5o494s5l4o5j5j5j226q4e4z3j4k544c4m4j42394c46494s5o5a40654t336o4g454g5h5u5t5a4q5m5k493i564y5" </a></div><div style="clear:both;"></div></div><div><sup>Sponsored</sup></div></div><div class="cell show-for-medium medium-6" style="padding: 0.6rem;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="87879" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="87879" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.33</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="21">21</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="5"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Bright, Hot</b> by <b>Pleasing</b> is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. <b>Bright, Hot</b> was launched in 2023. Top notes are Plum and Tobacco; middle notes are Sea water and Orris; base notes are Vanilla Absolute, Cedarwood, Amber and Tonka Bean. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Fading into sleep beneath the hot sun. Eyelids gently, slowly shut, the orange hue behind closed eyes transforms into a canvas for a dream. An exhilarating adventure. Time slips away, basking in a midday reverie. </p>

<p>Bright, Hot’s heady woody amber scent comes together with top notes of plum and tobacco leaves offset with orris butter and marine accord, with the dryness of cedarwood, tonka bean, vanilla, and crisp amber rounding out the scent. </p>

<p>Top: Plum, tobacco leaves.</p>

<p>Mid: Orris butter, marine accord.</p>

<p>Dry: Cedarwood, tonka bean absolute, vanilla absolute Madagascar, crisp amber.</p>

<p>As with each Pleasing fragrance, Bright, Hot has been made in collaboration with esteemed fragrance house Robertet, the world leader in sustainable, natural raw materials. Shared value programs, consciously harvested materials, locally sourced ingredients through partnerships with co-op programs that support small communities and environmentally efficient production methods underscore each fragrance from Pleasing. </p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Pleasing/Bright-Hot-87879.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Deutsch</a>,  <a href="https://www.fragrantica.es/perfume/Pleasing/Bright-Hot-87879.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Español</a>,  <a href="https://www.fragrantica.fr/parfum/Pleasing/Bright-Hot-87879.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Français</a>,  <a target="_blank" rel="noopener">Italiano</a>,  <a href="https://www.fragrantica.ru/perfume/Pleasing/Bright-Hot-87879.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Русский</a>,  <a href="https://www.fragrantica.pl/perfumy/Pleasing/Bright-Hot-87879.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Polski</a>,  <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com.br/perfume/Pleasing/Bright-Hot-87879.html" <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2198379" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2198379" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astralmonad870"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astralmonad870" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Jardin-de-L-Orangerie-72594.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72594.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardin de L'Orangerie"title="Jardin de L'Orangerie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2198379ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2198379" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935">astralmonad870</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-24">06/24/24 15:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Well, I spent my money on a travel spray set and I found 2 out of 3 pleasing. This one was my favourite. In fact, I'll be spending my hard-earned money on a full bottle since it'll be my signature scent in the winter. <br />
<br />
I've smelled thousands of fragrances in my lifetime and this one was truly unique enough to buy! <br />
<br />
This is a very cozy, delicious and creamy unisex cold-weather fragrance that is high-quality. Lasts a long time on your skin and is artfully blended. I've smelled Tobacco Vanille, which I don't care for since it reminds me of coca-cola. This smells nothing like that.<br />
<br />
Update: I think that with the marine note and creamy undertone this smells very similar to Rivulets although they have completely different notes. Unfortunately the crisp amber note in the drydown gives me a slight headache, so I settled on a full bottle of Rivulets instead.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87879"comment_id="2198379"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Pleasing/Bright-Hot-87879.html?ccid=2198379#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1994230" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1994230" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sunnyviolets"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1459768"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1459768.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sunnyviolets" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1994230ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1994230" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1459768">sunnyviolets</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-06">12/06/23 13:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What is it with reviews being deleted? That's not very cash money of you fragrantica. What I posted that got taken down:<br />
<br />
$135. I don't think so. No, sir. Great company though for being vegan and cruelty-free.<br />
<br />
None of these fragrances - all of which are pretty much ripping off more popular frags - sound pleasing at all.<br />
<br />
Upon sampling these, I am once again saying they are not pleasing at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87879"comment_id="1994230"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Pleasing/Bright-Hot-87879.html?ccid=1994230#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1988354" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1988354" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tigertail95"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330716"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1330716.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tigertail95" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1988354ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1988354" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330716">Tigertail95</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-29">11/29/23 12:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Received my bottle yesterday. So far I'm enjoying it. I was a bit nervous about the marine note, marine is generally not my favorite. This isn't an overpowering marine. On me the tobacco isn't very loud. It's there but very well blended with the plum. As it dries the wood and amber become more prominent. That's when I really start to borderline love this one. Please don't buy thinking you'll get another Tobacco Vanille. I find this one different from TV. <br />
<br />
Unisex but leans masculine. Longevity on my skin is moderate. Sillage is pretty strong. Bottle is gorgeous. <br />
<br />
I think it's worth the price. I'm curious about the other two in this line. May buy one of those in the new year.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87879"comment_id="1988354"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Pleasing/Bright-Hot-87879.html?ccid=1988354#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1977466" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1977466" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sunnyviolets"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1459768"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1459768.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sunnyviolets" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1977466ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1977466" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1459768">sunnyviolets</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-15">11/15/23 15:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>$135. I don't think so. No, sir. Great company though for being vegan and cruelty-free.<br />
<br />
None of these fragrances - all of which are pretty much ripping off more popular frags - sound pleasing at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87879"comment_id="1977466"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Pleasing/Bright-Hot-87879.html?ccid=1977466#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1974690" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1974690" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Neptino"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1586684"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1586684.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Neptino" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Homme-Ideal-Eau-de-Parfum-37735.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.37735.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L’Homme Ideal Eau de Parfum"title="L’Homme Ideal Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1974690ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1974690" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1586684">Neptino</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-12">11/12/23 03:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Harry Styles, being a huge fan and singular wearer of Tobacco Vanille by Tom Ford, influenced this fragrance to smell similar. However, the tobacco comes through more and this lasts longer. Awesome for the price. Way better than the overpriced Tom Ford Private Blends. This fragrance also reminds me heavily of L'Homme Idéal Extrême by Guerlain. Almost a cross between that and the Tom Ford cult following Tobacco Vanille.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87879"comment_id="1974690"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Pleasing/Bright-Hot-87879.html?ccid=1974690#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1974690" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1974690" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Neptino"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1586684"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1586684.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Neptino" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Homme-Ideal-Eau-de-Parfum-37735.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.37735.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L’Homme Ideal Eau de Parfum"title="L’Homme Ideal Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1974690ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1974690" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1586684">Neptino</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-12">11/12/23 03:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Harry Styles, being a huge fan and singular wearer of Tobacco Vanille by Tom Ford, influenced this fragrance to smell similar. However, the tobacco comes through more and this lasts longer. Awesome for the price. Way better than the overpriced Tom Ford Private Blends. This fragrance also reminds me heavily of L'Homme Idéal Extrême by Guerlain. Almost a cross between that and the Tom Ford cult following Tobacco Vanille.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87879"comment_id="1974690"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Pleasing/Bright-Hot-87879.html?ccid=1974690#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1988354" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1988354" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tigertail95"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330716"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1330716.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tigertail95" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1988354ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1988354" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330716">Tigertail95</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-29">11/29/23 12:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Received my bottle yesterday. So far I'm enjoying it. I was a bit nervous about the marine note, marine is generally not my favorite. This isn't an overpowering marine. On me the tobacco isn't very loud. It's there but very well blended with the plum. As it dries the wood and amber become more prominent. That's when I really start to borderline love this one. Please don't buy thinking you'll get another Tobacco Vanille. I find this one different from TV. <br />
<br />
Unisex but leans masculine. Longevity on my skin is moderate. Sillage is pretty strong. Bottle is gorgeous. <br />
<br />
I think it's worth the price. I'm curious about the other two in this line. May buy one of those in the new year.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87879"comment_id="1988354"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Pleasing/Bright-Hot-87879.html?ccid=1988354#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="87879" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                                                        <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="87879" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="search-reviews"><search-perfume-reviews :perfume_id="87879":random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]"></search-perfume-reviews></div></div><foundation-tabs></foundation-tabs></reviews-wrapper></div><perfume-shortcut-menu :perfume_id="87879" when-hidden="#toptop"></perfume-shortcut-menu><initialize-status-data></initialize-status-data><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_footer -->

        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"
              tabindex="1" title="This perfume is a bit heavier from the type of perfumes that I use to wear however I like this scent very much. It&#039;s herbal, sweet, feminine and I have never smell something like this. It&#039;s on my top favorites for sure.">by
            <em>Fairyfer</em> <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/s.1811132.jpg"

    </div>

        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">20.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Montale.html" class="en2inter">Montale</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            </div>
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">21.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Carolina-Herrera.html" class="en2inter">Carolina Herrera</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">22.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian.html" class="en2inter">Maison Francis Kurkdjian</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">23.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Prada.html" class="en2inter">Prada</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">24.&nbsp;</span>

<script>
    let md5_mfga_js = "7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1";
    let toAbby = "OTViMzNiMzA5OTU0ZTQwOThlMzgwOWNkNDEzMmQ2YjRmOTAyMTA1ZTJmYjgzZmQ4N2Q2MzRhMGFiNjAzODQ5ZnZhbGlkVW50aWw9MTczNDI4NzA4NQ==";

    let toLocale = "en";

<script>
    var lang = 'EN';
    $(document).ready(function () {
                if (lang == 'EN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com") });
                if (lang == 'DE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.de").replace(/designers/, "Designer").replace(/perfume/, "Parfum") });

            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.es").replace(/designers/, "disenador") });
                if (lang == 'FR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {

<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
